roleset.name: extremely sad; inducing grief
roleset.note: TRAGIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from tragic.01-j)

example.name: tragic-j: both args
example.text: Cameron's death was tragic in its suddenness, as his life had been tragic in its prolonged misfortune and struggle.

roleset.name: disasterous event

example.name: tragedy-n
example.text: Iraq's tragedy of errors: Why the Sunnis are revolting.
